attributes.action: Recognise 24th June as an official bank holiday marking British Independence Day
attributes.additional_details: Our ancestors have fought and given their lives to stand up for what was right. Freedom of speech and democracy have prevailed. Britain shall once again be GREAT.
attributes.background: 24th June 2016 marks a day in history when the peoples wish was recognised by way of a vote. We want this day each year to mark the celebration of this historic moment and to show the world how proud we are of the democratic society in which we live.
